doc.title: Hard Hitting
doc.plot: James Sima is a lone wolf. His family was murdered by drug dealers and he lives only for revenge. He partners up with Zed. Both are ex military and highly trained martial artists. James gets his chance to kill the drug dealer he's been searching for when he meets the wife of a murdered corporate head who needs their help to save her kidnapped son. James and Zed take us on a high octane action ride on their super bikes, using the latest weaponry and the highest level of mixed martial arts.
